name: Volcanic
description: Enemies cause eruptions of flame near distant players. Additional volcanoes may appear near existing volcanoes.

name: Necrotic
description: Enemy melee attacks apply a stacking debuff that deals damage and reduces healing received. Debuff lasts 9 seconds and is dispelled when exiting combat.

name: Teeming
description: Additional non-boss enemies are present throughout the dungeon; kill count requirement increased.

name: Raging
description: Non-boss enemies will enrage at low health, dealing double damage until killed.

name: Bolstering
description: Non-boss enemies will buff nearby allies' health and damage when defeated with a 30yd effective range.

name: Sanguine
description: Shortly after death, non-boss enemies will leave a pool of blood on the ground, which grows to a 5yd radius over 2 seconds. This pool heals enemies and damages players for a % of their maximum health. The pool's radius is 8 yds.

name: Tyrannical
description: Bosses have more health and deal 15% more damage.

name: Fortified
description: Non-bosses have more health and deal 30% more damage.

name: Bursting
description: When slain, non-boss enemies explode, causing all players to suffer 10% of their maximum health in damage over 4 seconds. (5% every 2 seconds) This effect stacks.

name: Grievous
description: While below 90% health, players are afflicted with Grievous Wound.

name: Explosive
description: Creatures have a chance to summon an Explosive Orb at a nearby location that will explode, inflicting damage 50% of the player’s maximum health as damage.

name: Quaking
description: Players will periodically Quake, inflicting 20% of the player’s maximum health as damage and interrupting spell casts of themselves and nearby allies.
